channel.title: Err, well do you know manga art?
channel.description:
Just asking because im working on a game of mines and need someone who can draw manga. Heres mines I done it in MS Paint because i cant use my other computer online at the moment.
[IMG]http://i12.tinypic.com/4unbpxl.jpg[/img] [br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2007, 01:07:28 AM[/size][hr]err, well I tryed to make that bottom dark part a shadow lawl, not a oreo cookie look like lol.

item.title: Err, well do you know manga art?

item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

It would look more like a shadow if you made it show to the left/right and made the colors fade twords the end(this can be done in paint)
